name: Mind Dead
description: Play as Max Cooper, an SSF agent whose journey to a deserted oil producing community with a group of scientists has led to an outbreak of infection back at their research facility. Fight hard for survival as you battle the hordes of fierce infectees in this action survival game.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 8 64bit Processor: core i3 @ 3.30GHz or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 equivalent or higher Storage: 1500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 10 64bit or higher Processor: core i5 equivalent or higher Memory: 6 GB RAM Storage: 1500 MB available space
